argument.description: An expression that specifies the element value for the array.
An expression that specifies the element value for the array.
An expression that specifies the element value for the array.
The sort key can be a column name or a sort-key-expression.
The sort key can be a column name or a sort-key-expression.
Specifies the index of an associative array.

description: The ARRAY_AGG function aggregates a set of elements into an array.
sample:
CREATE TYPE PHONELIST AS DECIMAL(10, 0)ARRAY[10]

 CREATE TABLE EMPLOYEE (
   ID          INTEGER NOT NULL,
   PRIORITY    INTEGER NOT NULL,
   PHONENUMBER DECIMAL(10, 0),
   PRIMARY KEY(ID, PRIORITY))
